data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Price, Benjamin W., Liu, Xingyue, Moor, Ferdy C. de, Villet, Martin H. (2012): A review of the alderfly genus Leptosialis Esben-Petersen (Megaloptera, Sialidae) with description of a new species from South Africa. ZooKeys 201: 27-41, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.201.2623, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.201.2623
